EmailTemplate.name: Phone Hearing Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Your Request for a Telephone Hearing with the SFMTA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings. This email confirms that your tow hearing (Telephone) is scheduled for {!Case.Date_Hearing_Scheduled__c} at {!Case.Hearing_Time__c}.
Here is your tow hearing Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Reference this number should you have questions about your hearing.
The Hearing officer will call you at the appointed time at the number you have provided. If you wish to submit any further evidence during your call, you will be provided with an email address to send documents to.
You may have to wait for the hearing officer to call after the appointed time. If after 30 minutes you have not received a phone call, please call the Tow Hearing Desk at (415) 701-5402.
Regards,
SFMTA Hearing Section
